title: The Theme of virtue as seen through the main character in Henry Fielding's Amelia
abstract: This thesis concerns the study of the theme of virtue through the main character in Henry Fielding 's Amelia . In trying to prove the theme of v irtue in the novel, the thesis uriter Will analyze the main character, Amelia 's quality , speeeh , actions and behaviour topard any prob lems befallen on her life. Other characters ' opinions about the main character are also quite important to be analyzed in order to reveal the characteristics of the the main charaeter . Heanuhile , to complete the discussion, the conflicts experienced by the main character are also mentioned in the analys is . From the d iscussion , the thesis Writer finds out that the main character in the novel, Amelia is firm enough to bear all the problems and confliets in her life. She, even can Win over her bad circumstances and her virtue remains unshaken . Therefore, through the character of Amelia, the thene of virtue in the novel is proved .
subjects: FIELDING, HENRY, 1707-1754. VIRTUE AS SEEN THROUGH; ENGLISH FICTION-18TH CENTURY-STUDY AND TEACHING
